cast.name: 费利西亚·舒尔曼 Felicia Shulman
露辛达·戴维斯 Lucinda Davis

introduction: In the year 3021, on a space station somewhere between Mars and Jupiter in the Milky Way, 8-year-old Ella Ryder sets out with her friends on exciting adventures of discovery. And because they are in space, there is lots to experience and even more to explore!While Ella’s adventures are spine tingly fun, they are also always emotionally charged allowing her to discover a little bit more about herself with each unexpected challenge - challenges that help her understand what makes her as unique as her name: Interstellar Ella.
